Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: OFFICIAL UPDATE  Since our Token is nearing it's 1 year anniversary, we decided to update you on the progress of our project. Throughout the last few months we have posted plenty of Medium articles that explain our development in more detail, you can find these here:  Medium: https://medium.com/@beat.org  We have finalized the supply, distributed BEAT to our investors, paid out the bounty rewards, and have been listed on IDEX as well as Bitforex. In addition to this you can check the price of BEAT on CoinMarketCap.  IDEX: https://idex.market/eth/beat Bitforex: https://www.bitforex.com/en/trade/spotTrading?commodityCode=BEAT&currencyCode=ETH CoinMarketCap: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/beat/  We also got the chance to introduce BEAT to the minister of health of East Belgium Antonios Antoniadis:  Article: https://medium.com/beattoken/beat-visits-the-minister-of-health-of-east-belgium-antonios-antoniadis-74ef118c9814  Our website has been updated from an ITS focussed site to a landing page for our ecosystem:  Website: https://beat.org/  The biggest step we have taken so far is the release of the BEAT App, which enables you to accept challenges and earn BEAT for being active. It is the first introduction into our ecosystem. It is available for iOS and Android.  iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/beat-be-active/id1459550843?ls=1&mt=8 Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.beat.client Announcement: https://medium.com/@beat.org/launching-the-beat-app-69f4fa0e3d24  There are already 2 Challenges available within the App, both of which are offered by the MySports GmbH. Development on the App is ongoing and updates are pushed regularly.  Our community has moved from Telegram to Discord. While our Telegram channel still exists, it is only used for announcements at this point. Please join our Discord Server to discuss new features on BEAT and be part of our Community!  Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/PnyFgdX Twitter: https://twitter.com/beattoken Telegram: https://t.me/beattoken  Thank you to everyone within our community for being part of this awesome journey!  -J

Author: hussainshah7
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: No KYC on team and looks like name advisor hunting, be good to know the commitments and fees of advisors. The bounty and advisors are at 9.5% and thsi needs to be split as general bounties are around 2% max so 7.5% or so for advisors would be unacceptable. Not enough details on lock ups for advisors. Huge hard cap that I dont understand and looking at milestones it will cost 2.5m euro to do the app ? That is a huge amount for an app so not sure how much work has been oput into the budget allocations or who tehyw ill be paying for dev work. these numbers to me dont make sense At the basic level its a few API's and a 50k app if outsourced so need to understand where the 2.5m for the app comes from to get any credilibiliy on milestones and total funding needed

Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: Hey devilzero, the "big development" over several years took primarily place at Magicline, one of the members of SportAlliance. It was (and still is) a huge project and we work very close with our clients to fulfill their needs, which makes us quiet successful. Next to that, we have a very strong team of developers who share all the same vision to bring health and motivation into our society. So you're absolutely right - it's not easy at all, but we run this pretty well

Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: We're entering a new corner of crypto by adressing many sportsman. Many of them never got in contact with crypto before. I think it would be irresponsible to not explain them exactly what they're into. If you already knew everything, just skip the chapter where you feel like we're trying to teach you what crypto is.

Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: Hey xperiance1814 - rather then checking accounts of newbies, why not take the time and energy to concentrate on our whitepaper, and the vision behind the project. The explanation for the many comment by new members could be caused by a giveaway special via twitter. We didn't wanted the thread get filled by single posts, but actually we raised attention by many people who haven't been in touch with the bitcoin forum before. Let's not judge them for being interested and excited for this project, since we all share the same goal of combining sports and crypto for a more healthy and motivated society.  In addition to this, as my colleague beat-daniel just mentioned before, we developed multiple companies in the past to set up the ecosystem and are now launching BEAT as the last part to connect all parts of the ecosystem. If we wanted to do a scam project, we could have done this with a lot less investment (There are already 20 mid private equity invest in the companies). Of course, you should always be careful,  beware of scammers and ask if somethings unclear. But I think based on what we already said before, we're a serious business.  Anyway, we're always happy about serious questions about our project and want to use this plattform as well to answer. So, if you have any questions left, feel free to let us know.

Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: BEAT Token - BLOCKCHAIN MEETS SPORTS: Unleash the power of your health and fitness data  Extended until July 15th 2018 - BUY TOKEN  Join us in revolutionizing the way the world is doing sports. 3 years of development with 40 rockstar developers, already a market leader in Germany with thousands of business customers, millions of members and a strong partner ecosystem.  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/1600/0*cThvy3dwEwlxUQ_3.  Key information  The BEAT token Pre-Sale runs from January 23rd, 2018 to February 20th, 2018 The BEAT token Sale runs later on from February 20th, 2018 to July 15th, 2018 (Read here for more info) BEAT Token: Ethereum ERC-20 - capped at 5,000,000,000 Tokens 70% of all available BEATs are allocated to the token sale - unsold tokens from this allocation will be burned Participate with Ether more options including fiat will be added in future phases No Minimum Contribution - feel free to contribute 1 Wei ;-) Exceptional Team: 140 employees, 40 developers, experienced management team and professional advisors Trading: expected to be traded on multiple exchanges Initial Token Price: 1 BEAT = 0.01 EUR. This price will increase every week by 0.001 EUR Referral Program: multi level referral program. 15% bonus direct referrals, additional 5% bonus for referrals by your direct referrals. Bounty Program: available on https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2851849.0 Product: already several hundred man-years invested in research & development, dominant market-leader in Germany, ready to scale worldwide  Useful Links  WHITEPAPER EMAIL INFORMATION FACEBOOK TWITTER YOUTUBE TELEGRAM GITHUB REDDIT   The Masterplan  Unlock the hidden value of your health and fitness data with the BEAT blockchain - one heartbeat at a time.  Imagine an incorruptible safeguard for your health and fitness data that seamlessly connects you with all the institutions, companies and people that can help leverage it. BEAT is exactly this: a state-of-the-art blockchain platform that safekeeps your data and allows you to share it with sports sponsors, talent scouts, doctors, insurance companies and many more to unlock the vast potential hidden in your health and fitness data - one heartbeat at a time.   Who we are We are a network of companies, with one common goal: to embrace all sports participants and providers, and encourage people from all over the world to do more sports. We all know that increasing the amount of physical activity is good for us. Not only do sports and physical activities stimulate and sustain our health, sports also enhance our performance skills and increase our well-being. However, too few of us practice sports and exercise regularly and consistently.   BEAT Use Cases SPORTS SPONSORING - GYM By giving your employer and/or your insurance company access to your gym check-ins or in addition part of your activity and health data you get a discount from your gym recurring subscription fee. Sportspersons need to pay a fixed subscription fee for visiting gyms regularly. Gyms store the check-in data of sportspersons visiting. Gyms store activity and health data of digitally equipped devices of their visitors. Employers and Insurance Companies want to incentivize doing sports and stay healthy. Employers and Insurance Companies pay part of the subscription fee for regularly visiting the gym based on simple check-ins as approval for doing sports. Additional payments could be agreed on with access to further activity and health data.  SPORTS SPONSORING - EVERYONE All people doing sports with any kind of digitally equipped device capable of tracking sports activity will get rewarded with BEAT token in exchange for sharing anonymous activity and health data. MySports will be the first sponsor to demonstrate the endless possibilities available using the BEAT Blockchain with this sponsorship. Everyone is doing sports with any kind of digitally equipped device capable of tracking sports activity. The first real-world use case of BEAT will be sponsoring sportspersons. After the BEAT Blockchain has been established and is running MySports will offer a first BEAT Contract to every sportsperson in the BEAT Ecosystem to reward them for doing sports. Just for sharing anonymous activity and health data the sports person will receive BEAT token in exchange.  MEDICAL RESEARCH The BEAT Blockchain will help to improve clinical research quality. Blockchain technology could let people offer health records for research, without losing control over them. The BEAT Blockchain will solve some of health care’s major challenges, including: identity, privacy, data liquidity, care coordination and more. Doctors need to solve a major problem and share the problem with relevant data on the BEAT Blockchain. Other doctors see the shared data and the need for a solution on the BEAT Blockchain and decide to initiate a medical research study and document the necessary framework on the BEAT Blockchain. Together clinics and doctors gather input from worldwide participants and document it on the BEAT Blockchain. After enough input has been gathered part of the medical participants join together to finalize the initiated study and share the result on the BEAT Blockchain.  MEDICAL CARE The BEAT Blockchain provides a decentralized framework to share patient activity and health information across a range of applications and stakeholders. Benefits will be improved data integrity, decentralization, confidentiality and reduced transaction costs. Patients visit clinics and bring access to their own medical history data, stored on the BEAT Blockchain, with them. Clinics help the patient and store the results of the efforts on the BEAT Blockchain. Physiotherapists talk and work with the patient to reduce pain and restore health. They access the original patient data as well as the results from the clinic using the BEAT Blockchain and document their own progress on the BEAT Blockchain as well. Afterwards patients visit gyms to speed up their recovery, where the amount of visits and tracked activity and health data is stored on the Beat Blockchain.   The BEAT Ecosystem  http://i67.tinypic.com/v8cu95.jpg   More than a Dream and a Whitepaper  Already the market leader position in Germany, Europe’s most populous country and biggest economy, with a dominant market share State-of-the-art cloud platform built by 40 (and increasing) class-act developers Partner ecosystem already up-and-running, deeply integrated into the platform – ready to scale    Achievements and Roadmap  http://i65.tinypic.com/dvre50.jpgg   BEAT in the German Press  There are various articles in the German press about development, products, services, mindset and our successes so far:  Digital transformation: http://www.bodylife.com/aktuell/detail/artikel/digitalisierung-in-der-fitnessbranche.html  e-commerce: https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_weil-personalisierung-wirkt-10966.html https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_vom-onlineshop-zur-digitalen-plattform-10810.html  Marketing: https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_ein-neues-club-konzept-fuer-die-branche-10958.html  FinTech: https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_von-0-auf-100-millionen-euro-in-3-jahren-10720.html  Studio Management with Magicline: https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_zeitenwendewas-magicline-wirklich-vorhat-10621.html https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_softwareentwicklung-unter-realbedingungen-10542.html https://fitness-und-gesundheit.de/bericht_its-a-kind-of-magic--10375.html   Team  http://i67.tinypic.com/2hp4z6w.jpg  Daniel Hanelt - Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: We're a startup with more than 25years of history ;-). We "transformed" our old client based software into the cloud, helped our customers to go "digital" as well, invented the ecosystem around it, launched several proofs of concept for services (marketing, financial, etc.) and commerce (for a start B2B with B2C following soon) and are ready to expand further than Germany, Austria and Switzerland with already some few customers around the borders.  While thinking about the future of our ecosystem some 2-3 years ago we were searching for something that could be "the glue in the middle". At first we thought that this could be our end-customer App NoExcuse, with our B2B-Software Magicline on one part of the ecosystem and the world population on the other side, added in with various forms of services and e-Commerce up and below the picture.  During further development of our business with our different companies, that are now part of SportAlliance, we finally thought as well about using blockchain technology for worldwide secure access and exchange of data and as a store of value. We were looking for something expandable for all further ideas we have in mind. I joined Magicline some 1,5 years ago and i am myself a Bitcoingeek since early 2011, mined some Bitcoins myself long ago and assume that i was one of the catalysators towards Blockchain technology in our companies.  The blockchain is the best technology for our ecosystem as we really need to have something as worldwide store of value AND to do transactions as well, not just for one company but for all partners that are interested in joining us using BEAT. In example we think it is a good idea if you are doing sports somewhere and have your own personal workout program that really fits best to you and you move away from your home town or just start to do workout somewhere else, that you have the opportunity to take your personal workout program with you. That's something that on first site has nothing to do with BEAT, but shows our need for something like Blockchain for the future of our whole business. If you think something like that further, you easily could see, that it is even possible to trade/sell workout programs for BEAT, even your own workout program could be sold inside our ecosystem for BEAT, that have been "earned" by other persons through sportive activities.  Quiet long answer for a short question, but maybe it helps you, why we decided to use the blockchain as our technology of choice for "the glue in the middle" of our ecosystem.  Cheers   Jens

Author: beat-jens
Title: [ANN][TOKEN SALE] BEAT: DISRUPTING THE HEALTH AND SPORTS INDUSTRY
Body: As explained further in our white paper (https://beat.sportalliance.com/beat_whitepaper.pdf) SportAlliance is a combination of various companies all with the same CEO Daniel Hanelt.  We have some relevant numbers of our business in the white paper as well: Magicline GmbH is the recognized market leader for management software in the fitness industry, with more than 3,000 B2B installations in Germany alone (total of >1 Mio members in these >3,000 studios) Eurofit24 GmbH delivers administrative and financial services to owners and managers of sports facilities: It currently manages a volume exceeding 50 million euros (run rate) with a strong growth trajectory. Bedarf.de GmbH runs the online market place Bedarf.de: This e-commerce company was brought to market as proof of concept on how to monetize the aggregated demand of the German sports community. It already surpassed the 1 million annual run rate and is poised for further growth as it is highly scalable.  I hope this helps you somehow in your decision to invest in BEAT!  Best   Jens
